xwikidoc.title: Mail Translations
xwikidoc.content: admin.email=电子邮件 admin.email.description=设置邮件发送选项并查看邮件发送状态。 admin.emailgeneral=高级 ### Missing: admin.emailgeneral.description=Configure advanced mail parameters, like mail address obfuscation. ### Missing: admin.emailsend=Mail Sending admin.emailsend.description=设置邮件发送选项。 admin.emailstatus=邮件发送状态 admin.emailstatus.description=查看邮件的发送状态并重发未成功发送的邮件。 ### Missing: admin.emailstatus.hint=If you can't find the status of a mail then it may be because the property which sent the mail did not specify that mail status should persist. ### Missing: Mail.GeneralMailConfigClass_obfuscate=Obfuscate Email Addresses ### Missing: Mail.GeneralMailConfigClass_obfuscate.hint=This only affects the email addresses stored in object properties of type Email, as long as the default custom displayer for the Email property type is not overwritten. Example: a...@domain.org Mail.SendMailConfigClass_from=发件人的邮件地址 Mail.SendMailConfigClass_from.hint=发送通知邮件的默认邮件地址 Mail.SendMailConfigClass_bcc=密送（BCC）邮件地址 Mail.SendMailConfigClass_bcc.hint=邮件的默认密送（BCC）地址列表，以半角逗号分隔列表项 Mail.SendMailConfigClass_host=电子邮件服务器 Mail.SendMailConfigClass_host.hint=发送邮件使用的SMTP服务器地址，留空则为默认值（localhost） Mail.SendMailConfigClass_port=电子邮件服务器的端口号 Mail.SendMailConfigClass_port.hint=SMTP服务器的端口，留空则为默认值25 ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_username=Email Server Username Mail.SendMailConfigClass_username.hint=访问SMTP服务器需要的用户名，留空则为无需认证 ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_password=Email Server Password Mail.SendMailConfigClass_password.hint=访问SMTP服务器需要的密码，留空则为无需认证 Mail.SendMailConfigClass_properties=技术配置 Mail.SendMailConfigClass_properties.hint=上文没有定义的其他JavaMail属性，例如此语句将启用tls选项：mail.smtp.starttls.enable=true ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_sendWaitTime=Send Wait Time ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_sendWaitTime.hint=The delay between each mail being sent, in milliseconds (defaults to 8 seconds) Mail.SendMailConfigClass_discardSuccessStatuses=忽略成功发送的邮件 ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_discardSuccessStatuses.hint=No matter whether mail statuses are kept or not for mail that has been sent successfully (defaults to true) ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.date=Date ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.batchId=Batch ID ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.type=Type ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.recipients=Recipients ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.state=Status ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.wiki=Wiki ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.error=Error ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.actions=Actions ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.resend=Resend ### Missing: mailSender.admin.resendSuccess=The mail has been resent successfully ### Missing: mailSender.admin.resendFailure=Failed to resend. Click for more details.
